description: A pliable but hefty layer of living plant matter.
A powerful layer of bark, thicker in parts.
Your bark is spread evenly across your body.
Your bark is pulled together to protect your torso.
Your bark is latticed into a larger frame.
Iridescent feathers covering your entire body.  Provides some warmth and protection from the elements, but could be thicker.
Thin, patchy fur that clearly needs to grow more.
Though it's quite warm, your fur is also quite protective.
A heavy shag carpet of fur, somewhere between a ballistic vest and attic insulation.
While still formidable, this furry hide has lost a lot of its bulk to better endure the summer months.
The fur of a strong, wild creature.
A covering of fur that has thinned out for the summer.
The fur of a proud, wise creature.
A pile of fur around the neck, protecting from foes that go for the throat.
Skin like a spilled tub of paints, splattered in abstract shapes of chitin, fur, and hide.
Beauty is only skin deep, but with this skin, a knife might find itself broken in the beauty layer.
Folks that can't catch bullets with their skin insist that it's what's on the inside that counts.  Those folks don't know anything.
These are much better than puny human mouthparts.
Your fangs have properly developed, and are prepared for the kill.
Your chitinous skin doesn't sweat so well and it's a bit stiffer than before, but it's far more durable than your old human skin.
The skin hardens, develops.  Good, it will be needed.
The exoskeleton is soft and vulnerable.  It would be best to hide until it hardens.
When the time comes to prey, this platemail will be ready for any resistance.
The exoskeleton is weak, it will require more time to harden.
Useful for the hunt, suitable for maximum efficiency.
When the time comes to prey, this unwavering carapace will keep you safe from everything that could harm you.
This recently-molted carapace is still soft, and will need time to harden before it provides proper protection.
A powerful tool for snatching fish or breaking open shells.

You have a large, protective shell on your back, but unfortunately, it doesn't have enough space to fit inside or store anything, makes wearing anything on your torso impossible, and makes backpacks encumbering.
Your shell has grown larger and thicker.  You can hide yourself in it, as well as use it as a backpack, but torso armor is still off limits.
Your shell has grown larger and even thicker, and has a pearly sheen to it.  You can hide yourself in it, as well as use it as a backpack, but torso armor is still off limits.
Your dermis has toughened and started to grow scales in places.
Your scales have grown thicker and cover most of your body, providing solid armor.
Your skin has become a smooth and elegant mesh of interlocking scales.
Leathery and heavily armored, your lamellar skin has toughened for the fiercest battles ahead.

//: These do not preclude wearing glasses, but you'll get double-up penalties.  If you really needed to you could likely still situate the lenses in front of them.  You should probably just augment your eyes though.
description: Highly protective lenses which seal off your eyes from danger, routing your tear ducts to your mouth.
You have long, sharp claws at the tips of your fingers.
Your fingernails have become gnarled, twisted claws.
Your claws have toughened to become something akin to miniature butcher knives.
Your index fingers have become talons.  They make for wicked natural daggers.  Unfortunately, they get in the way of everything including gloves.
A pair of fangs sharp and sturdy enough to use in combat.
A wicked pair of fangs, pointed and surgically sharp.
